data.eml:eml: Redescription of Cis renominatus and Paratrichapus javanus (Coleoptera: Ciidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza-Gonçalves, Igor, Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano, Sandoval-Gómez, Vivian E. (2018): Redescription of Cis renominatus and Paratrichapus javanus (Coleoptera: Ciidae). Zootaxa 4429 (1): 132-140, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4429.1.5
